package.name: org.astoolkit.workflow
package.description:
The Workflow toolkit provides an API for declarative style tasks management. If you're familiar with Cairngorm 3, the basic concept is similar to the Task library (http://sourceforge.net/adobe/cairngorm/wiki/CairngormLibraries/#Task) although the Workflow toolkit is a far more advanced framework with data management features and greater flow control capabilities.

Extensions are provided to support Spicelib Parsley, ASToolkit XmlMapping and Adobe AIR specific tasks.
